Package com.github.daytron.revworks.service

Provides classes for data services for insertions, updates and retrievals of data from the database for students and lecturers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataInserter
    The base template for common SQL data insertion and update process for users.
    DataProvider
    The base template for common SQL data retrieval process for both student and lecturer users.
    LecturerDataInserter
    The base template for all SQL data insertion and update exclusive to lecturer users.
    LecturerDataProvider
    The base template for all SQL data retrieval exclusive to lecturer users.
    StudentDataInserter
    The base template for all SQL data insertion and update exclusive to student users.
    StudentDataProvider
    The base template for all SQL data retrieval exclusive to student users.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CurrentUserSession
    A static class for handling temporary user data in a session.
    DataInserterAbstract
    Abstract class for implementing DataInserter interface for common data insertion and update query process.
    DataProviderAbstract
    Abstract class for implementing DataProvider interface for common data retrieval query process.
    FileUploadReceiver
    A receiver that process file upload for coursework submission from the students and manage its state.
    LecturerDataInserterImpl
    Concrete implementation of LecturerDataInserter.
    LecturerDataProviderImpl
    Concrete implementation of LecturerDataProvider.
    NotificationInserter
    Class responsible for all SQL user notification data insertions.
    NotificationProvider
    Wrapper class for all SQL user notification data retrievals.
    QueryManagerAbstract
    The top level abstract class for common SQL reserving connection process for both data insertions and retrievals.
    SQLConnectionManager
    A class for establishing and retrieving connection from the database.
    StudentDataInserterImpl
    Concrete implementation of StudentDataInserter interface.
    StudentDataProviderImpl
    Concrete implementation of StudentDataProvider.

Package com.github.daytron.revworks.service Description

Provides classes for data services for insertions, updates and retrievals of data from the database for students and lecturers.
Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
